nml_option.name: config_use_idealAgeTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'idealAgeTracers' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_idealAgeTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'idealAgeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_idealAgeTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'idealAgeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_idealAgeTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'idealAgeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_idealAgeTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'idealAgeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_idealAgeTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'idealAgeTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_idealAgeTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'idealAgeTracers' category

package.name: idealAgeTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include idealAge.

package.name: idealAgeTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the idealAgeTracers group.

package.name: idealAgeTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the idealAgeTracers group.

package.name: idealAgeTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the idealAgeTracers group.

package.name: idealAgeTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the idealAgeTracers group.

package.name: idealAgeTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the idealAgeTracers group.

package.name: idealAgeTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the idealAgeTracers group.

var.name: iAgeSurfaceFlux
var.description: Flux of iAge through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: iAgeSurfaceFluxRunoff
var.description: Flux of iAge through the ocean surface due to river runoff. Positive into ocean.

var.name: iAgeSurfaceFluxRemoved
var.description: Flux of iAge that is ignored coming into the ocean. Positive into ocean.

var.name: iAgePistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which iAge is restored to iAgeSurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: iAgeSurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: iAge is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by iAgePistonVelocity.

var.name: iAgeInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which iAge is restored to iAgeInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: iAgeInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: iAge is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by iAgeInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: iAgeExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of iAge

var.name: iAgeIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, iAge is reset to iAge * iAgeIdealAgeMask, valid values of iAgeIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: iAgeTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, iAge is reset to TTDMask, valid values of iAgeTTDMask or 0 and 1
